main.name: Nobuhiro Ueda
main.description: I am a Ph.D. student at Kyoto University. My research interests are in natural language processing, especially basic analyses of language semantics.

education.school: Graduate School of Informatics, Kyoto University
education.description: Working on research about Natural Language Processing.
Learned about a wide range of engineering topics, including calculus, linear algebra, statistics, electronics, electromagnetism, and computer science.
